backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and per-user trade storage with save and query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Report linking implemented features to corresponding frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose of selected frontend domain and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens and dark/light themes for the app’s black‑and‑gold design.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up Internet Identity‑gated routing, profile setup flow, and app layout using TanStack Router and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginView.t: Login screen that initiates Internet Identity authentication and displays branding.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Modal prompting new authenticated users to create their profile and saving it via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/charts/EquityCur: Renders a line chart of equity balance over time using Recharts and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/components/charts/MonthlyPe: Renders a bar chart showing monthly pip performance with color-coded profit/loss.
frontend/src/components/charts/PairDistr: Renders a pie chart summarizing trade distribution across currency pairs using themed colors.
frontend/src/components/charts/SessionPe: Renders a bar chart of session performance using Recharts, showing trades and win rate or a placeholder if no data.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPanel.t: Provides a chatbot UI for querying performance metrics, managing message history and user input.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KpiGri: Displays key performance metrics in a grid of KPI cards with icons and formatted values.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeFor: Dialog for creating or editing trades with form state, validation, and save logic tied to backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradesTa: Renders a table of trades with formatting, discipline indicators, and edit/delete actions.
Layout component providing top bar, side nav, and main content structure.
frontend/src/components/shell/SideNav.ts: Sidebar navigation listing main app routes with active highlighting and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/shell/TopBar.tsx: Top navigation bar showing branding, user profile info, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/tools/Compoundin: Interactive tool that calculates and charts compound growth based on initial balance, monthly return, and duration.
frontend/src/components/tools/DrawdownRe: Computes the percentage return needed to recover from a given drawdown with user input.
frontend/src/components/tools/LotSizeCal: Calculates lot size, risk amount, and stop distance using trading inputs and optional default settings.
frontend/src/components/tools/PipCalcula: Determines pip distance and price difference between two prices based on pip value.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskOfRuin: Estimates probability of account ruin using win rate, average win/loss, and risk per trade.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskPercen: Computes risk percentage from account size and dollar risk amount.
frontend/src/domain/mappers.ts: Maps backend trade data to UI format and converts form data into a backend Trade object with validation and violations.
frontend/src/domain/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for trades, form data, performance metrics, and related domain entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout functions, and loads persisted identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls for profiles, trades, and settings with React Query hooks including mutations and invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light, dark, and base themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays performance metrics, charts, and trade analytics using fetched trades.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Shows a searchable trades table with create, edit, delete, and CSV export features.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React page that loads, edits, and saves user trading settings including defaults, theme, and strategy presets.
frontend/src/pages/ToolsPage.tsx: Page displaying multiple trading calculators via tabbed components for risk and position management.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Functions to compute trading performance metrics, equity curve, drawdown, streaks, and risk consistency.
frontend/src/utils/breakdowns.ts: Generates monthly, pair-based, and session-based performance breakdowns from trade data.
frontend/src/utils/chatbotRules.ts: Maps user chatbot queries to responses using performance metrics such as win rate, profit, and streaks.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Builds CSV export of trades and provides a browser download helper.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting dates, numbers, percentages, and currency.
frontend/src/utils/toolsMath.ts: Math helpers powering trading tools including risk percent, compounding, drawdown recovery, and risk of ruin.
frontend/src/utils/tradingCalculations.t: Core trading calculations including risk amount, stop distance, lot size, RR, P/L, percent gain, and pip value.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and optionally removing them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s state, goals, architecture notes, features, and image requirements.
